KB Tours is one of the few African American Heritage tours in Washington DC.

We tour to all four quadrants of the city. We like to show people the historic African American neighborhoods of Washington DC. We like to go off the beat and path . All of our guides knowledge of the interesting black history of Washington DC. We pride ourselves on giving good facts and telling great stories of Washington DC. Our guides will stay you throughout the tour.

We try to telling you facts that you never knew . We like to have fun and make people laugh but also keep them engage with stories.

We keep young children engaged on the tour by having to participate with the guide on the tour .After taking our tour you will be ready with your thirst for knowledge to enter the Museum of African American History and Culture.

Washington DC.Title: The National Gallery of Art DC Guided Museum Tour - Private Tour
Washington DC.Description:
This 2 to 2.5 hour private guided museum tour will show you the world’s most iconic artists inside two extraordinary buildings. The National Gallery of Art in Washington DC is a world-class museum housing an incredible timeline of Western Art from the old masters of the Renaissance to the quintessential personalities of the 20th Century. Raphael, Rembrandt, Renoir, Picasso, and Rothko are just a handful of artist on view (as well as Vigee le Brun, Cassatt, and O’Keeffe). 

Take excursion through the changes of history as told by magnificent works of art - money, power, war, hope, and triumph. From the intimacy of a da Vinci portrait to sweep of a Monet to the bold strokes of a Kandinsky, you will be dazzled by the vast holdings and the stories that accompany them. You’ll delight over familiar names and hidden gems while our passionate guides navigate you through notable highlights of technique and artwork from over the past seven centuries.

Washington DC.Title: Ghosts of Georgetown Walking Tour
Washington DC.Description:
Among the historic streets, manicured gardens and Victorian row houses of DC’s finest neighborhood lie deep, dark secrets about a forgotten past. Come along to hear stories from long ago that trace the development of Gerorgetown from a small tobacco port to a major commercial trading center. Many important historical figures have lived or stayed here and documented their experiences in letters and journals. Some of these folks have never left, haunting these grand residences to this day. 

On this family friendly tour you will learn about this town and be enchanted by its past, present, and future.

Washington DC.Title: Smithsonian Museum of American History Guided Tour - Private Tour
Washington DC.Description: Join this 2 to 2.5 hour private guided tour of the National Museum of American History to learn about the relatively short but immensely rich history of the United States of America. Our passionate guides will take you to some of the most captivating pieces on display at this one of a kind gallery.

Washington DC.Title: Washington DC Evening Tour
Washington DC.Description: Benefit from a small-group evening tour that takes you to Washington, DC's top attractions where you can see them illuminated for the night. Walk around landmarks dedicated to Presidents Abraham Lincoln and Thomas Jefferson, and visit war memorials for World War II and the Pentagon. Have time to photograph these famous locations and hear live commentary from your guide.

Washington DC.Title: Perfect Private Night Tour of Washington DC
Washington DC.Description:
Enjoy the Nation's Capitol at night! Your personal Tour Professional will pick you up from your hotel, then you'll be headed to see how Washington DC lights up when the sun goes down. 

Enjoy the beautiful Potomac River. See the enchanting Thomas Jefferson Memorial reflected in the Tidal Basin. See the Washington Monument's breath taking reflection in the reflection pool. Enjoy an educational, and entertaining narration while you are escorted in your luxury SUV by your tour professional through the city of Washington DC. 

Bottled water is provided during this great experience.

PENTAGON MEMORIAL IS CLOSED UNTIL MEMORIAL DAY 2020!!!

Washington DC.Title: Perfect Private DC In A Day Tour with Lunch
Washington DC.Description: This is a 5 hour private tour of Washington DC in your very own private vehicle. You are allowed up to 4 guests. You get a personal tour professional to guide you to each site, pick you up from your hotel, and drop you off following the tour. You will get out and walk up to each site listed and get history, details, and all of your questions answered. This is a full day tour with a break for lunch INCLUDED with tour!

Washington DC.Title: Full-Day Tour in Washington DC
Washington DC.Description: Travel with a guide into the Nation's Capital and learn some of the secrets about the town. We will depart with a breakfast stop around 9am. We start with visiting some popular sites at Arlington Cemetery, then make our way to many of the memorials. Lincoln, Vietnam, Korea, World War II, FDR, Dr. King are highlights. A driving tour of the city is next with picture stops of the White House and Capitol. The afternoon is free time for lunch or whatever you would like (typically around two hours). After meeting we begin to depart with a possible bonus stop before leaving the town, we arrive back Williamsburg between 8-10pm.

Miami.Title: Little Havana Food and Walking Tour in Miami
Miami.Description: Taste your way through Miami’s Little Havana neighborhood on a food walking tour exploring the vibrant and historic neighborhood. Try everything from Cuban coffee to home-style Cuban cooking, with plenty of tastings for a full lunch. Exploring Little Havana with a guide means you learn the stories behind each item you try, meet local artists, watch deft cigar rollers, and take in the bustling scene at Domino Park.

Miami.Title: Speedboat Sightseeing Tour of Miami
Miami.Description: Thrill seekers that want to experience the Miami coastline should look no further than this speedboat adventure—the only speedboat sightseeing tour that takes you offshore for a blistering ride. Just hop aboard, and get ready to feel the wind whipping your face as you zoom through the surf. Along the way, pass Star Island and Fisher Island, enjoy views of yachts and mansions, and check out bustling South Beach.

Miami.Title: Everglades National Park Biologist Led Adventure: Cruise, Hike + Airboat
Miami.Description: Delve deep into the Everglades National Park on this master-naturalist-led experience. Look for manatees, birds, and dolphins on a Ten Thousand Island boat trip, ride an airboat deep into the River of Grass to see alligators, take a wildlife-spotting dry nature hike and drive under huge cypress trees; and visit a Native tree island village only reachable by boat and a historical trading post. Lunch and multi-location pickups are included.

Miami.Title: Everglades Airboat 30-60 min with pickup or self drive options
Miami.Description:
This popular tour includes everything Everglades National Park has to offer. 

Choose between a guided tour with convenient pick-up in various languages or drive yourself to the Everglades.

Explore Everglades National park by airboat and see alligators and other creatures in their natural habitat. Explore the gift and coffee shop with restrooms.

Miami.Title: 3 - 4 hours Everglades Tour from Miami
Miami.Description: The tropical wetlands of the Everglades National Park lie just outside of Miami. On this tour, set sail on a flat propelled airboat for a short cruise around the Everglades and admire the wild landscapes from the water. Look out for wildlife such as alligators, tortoises, and exotic birds along the way, then learn more about the region’s unique ecosystems during a wildlife show.

Miami.Title: Manatee Photo Safari and Miami Kayak with Paddle Board Tour
Miami.Description:
Blimey!

It’s Manatee Season! Ready your cameras and paddles, it’s the best time of the year for wild manatee viewing! Multiple Manatee families have made a home out of our lagoon and absolutely love to pose for the cameras. Come join us in the early mornings or winter afternoons for an exclusive Manatee Photo Safari with an occasional dolphin or two!

Please keep in mind that these wild and protected animals. It is illegal to molest, harass, disturb, and even to hug a manatee. We will view these beautiful, yet funny looking animals as close as reasonably possible. Photo opportunities are plenty on this close-up and personal eco-adventure.

Miami.Title: Key West Day Trip from Miami with Activities
Miami.Description: Expand your Miami vacation to include Key West during this day trip. After comfortable transfer from your hotel, enjoy around six hours to explore on your own. Visit the Hemingway House, check out Mallory Square, or have a slice of the iconic key lime pie. Your time is your own. Add on a Floridian activity, such as parasailing, snorkeling, or a glass-bottom boat cruise (additional expense).

Miami.Title: 1-Hour Air boat Ride and Nature Walk with Naturalist in Everglades National Park
Miami.Description: Immerse yourself in two distinct adventures on this combination tour. First, go on a nature walk with a naturalist guide in Everglades National Park. See hardwood hammocks, a variety of birds, and wild alligators. Then go on a thrilling air boat ride far from land, out over the vast expanse of the River of Grass, and a visit to a Native tree island village. Pickup and drop-off from your Fort Lauderdale or Miami area hotel, airport, or Port Miami is included.

Miami.Title: Wynwood Graffiti Golf Cart Small-Group Tour
Miami.Description: Maximize your time in Wynwood Art District by covering ground quickly in an open-air golf cart. Your guide takes you and a small group on a private tour by cart through this ever-evolving neighborhood famous for its massive street art murals. Learn about the industrial area’s history, take photos along the way, and learn where the best restaurants, breweries, and art galleries are located.

Miami.Title: Miami Combo Tour: City Sightseeing, Biscayne Bay Cruise and Everglades Airboat Ride
Miami.Description: See Miami and the Everglades on a tour that lets you experience many of southern Florida’s top sites in one day. Get your bearings on a double-decker bus tour of Miami’s downtown, Little Havana, and South Beach; cruise Biscayne Bay on a boat tour; and head to the Everglades National Park to spot crocodiles and alligators on an airboat safari.

Miami.Title: Miami Skyline 90 min Cruise of South Beach Millionaire Homes & Venetian Islands
Miami.Description:
Miami Skyline 90-min cruise departs from Biscayne Bay in the heart of Downtown. Pass the famous Star Island known for Al Capone’s Mansion. Cruise to Millionaire’s Homes Hibiscus Island, Palm Island, Sunset Island, Fischer Island plus famous Venetian Islands. Discover the mansions rich and famous.

You haven’t seen Miami until you’ve seen it from the water. Your bi-lingual English and Spanish tour guide will point out the famous homes and landmarks along the way. Enjoy a cash bar on board serving beverages and snacks. Our fleet consists of a bi-level yacht with air conditioning and first level large open windows and shaded top deck. 

Expect to pass the famous villas of Villa Michaela located on Hibiscus, Flager Memorial Island, Villa Charmaine, Villa Angela located on San Marco Island at the Venetian Way and Al Capone’s Mansion plus the Famous Standard Spa and Resort located at Belle Island. Enjoy the view!

Upgrade to include a Hop-on Hop-off Double Decker Bus ticket or Everglades!

Miami.Title: Private Night/Sunset Boat Cruise in Miami
Miami.Description:
It is a unique  experience as it allows our guests to experience Miami from the Sea. The night tour experience is unique on itself in comparison to a daily trip because there is no charter traffic from other boats during this time. Since we will be cruising through the bay the water at this time is very calm giving the impression that we are actually floating through the water. Throughout the cruise guests will have plenty of time to ask questions, take pictures or open a drink to enjoy the views (water is complimentary)of the impressive Miami skyline. No restroom on board. No shoes on allowed on board

This tour is offered in a brand-new Monterey 2021 model,. The ride is so smooth thanks to its cutting-edge technology. This boat is literally a floating jewel 

We recommend to be there 20/25 minutes before departure to avoid any delays on the departure time

IMPORTANT: You can find a map with detailed information around parking and departure spot in the photos section of this product

Miami.Title: 2Hr Private Boat Tour Miami Beach, Captain & Champagne, See the Island & Sandbar
Miami.Description:
Enjoy the day on the water with friends & family in Miami Beach with Dolphin Water Sport .

20 ft Bayliner, This beautiful boat is fully equipped with Bluetooth sound system.

Enjoy a unique & personalized experience with our private tour!

Water, Champagne & Ice Included

2, 4, 6 or 8 hour tours.

Perfect for a day on the water, Cruise the Intracoastal and see the homes of the Rich & Famous, see some dolphins along the way, take a ride the Biscayne Bay or just chill out at one of the Sandbars sipping your favorite drink.

Get to know the Islands, virgin beaches and sandbar of Biscayne Bay, you can also observe marine life, You could sunbathe, swim or even snorkel.

Great for Birthdays, Anniversaries, Bachelor/Bachelorette/Wedding Parties or any special occasion up to 6 people.

Our U.S. Coastguard certified captains have 10+ years experience and they're outgoing and accommodating personalities will ensure that is most enjoyable.

** Please read the inclusions & exclusions**

Miami.Title: Combo:Miami City Sightseeing,90 Min Biscayne Bay Cruise+Everglades Airboat Tour
Miami.Description: This is a full day tour where we will visit the Everglades Sawgrass section and go on the famous Airboat ride. We will then travel to Bayside Market place where there will be free time for lunch and to go on the 90 minute Miami Skyline and Millionaire sightseeing cruise. Our day will end with and incredible tour of Miami on a Double Decker bus

Miami.Title: Private Helicopter Tour around Miami and Key Biscayne
Miami.Description:
We will offer you a unique PRIVATE experience from the moment you arrive until the end, not only because of the tour but because of our detailed oriented personalized customer service. 

We will fly from North to South through the shoreline and the bay, all around the exclusive island of Key Biscayne.

This guided tour will allow you to appreciate part of this beautiful city from a different perspective, from the buildings, mansions, and constructions, to the variety of wild-ocean life. 

If it’s your lucky day, which we know it will be, you can see dolphins, sharks, turtles, rays, manatees and more, while we are flying over the ocean, near the shoreline. You will be amazed at how closed these species can get to you when you are having fun at the beach. 

In general, flying in a helicopter generates different emotions, from facing your fears, to experiencing a high sense of amaze, gratitude, and happiness.

Miami.Title: South Beach Cultural Food and Walking Tour
Miami.Description: Discover South Beach flavors on a gourmet walking tour that explores 5-star restaurants and under-the-radar foodie favorites. A guide makes sure you don't miss the architectural gems of South Beach’s art deco district. You also learn about South Beach culture and visit several kitchens for tastings that blend the neighborhood’s diverse Latin and Mediterranean flavors into a multicourse meal.

Miami.Title: Miami Shared Helicopter Tour
Miami.Description: Unlike other area tours, ours is flown in a spacious, air-conditioned, jet-engine helicopter. We will never 'up-sell' clients upon arrival, and our pilots are extremely professional and fun! We believe in taking care of the customer first, and safety is at the heart of all we do. This tour is the perfect way to see South Beach and and the surrounding area in a way that will create life-long memories!

Miami.Title: 45' Yacht Tour in Miami Beach with Captain and Private Boat Rental
Miami.Description:
Enjoy the day on the water with friends & family in Miami Beach with Dolphin Water Sport .

45 ft Sea Ray Sundancer with 2 State Rooms & 2 full bathrooms, This beautiful Sea Ray is fully equipped with excelent Bluetooth sound system, A/C, stove, microwave, refrigerator, freezer, television, and much more!

Enjoy a unique and personalized experience with our private tour!

Water, Champagne & Ice Included

4, 6 or 8 hour tours, Available for night trips.

Perfect for a day or evening out on the water, Cruise the Intracoastal and see the homes of the Rich & Famous, see some dolphins along the way, take a ride the Biscayne Bay or just chill out at one of the Sandbars where you can barbecue or relax sipping your favorite drink.

Great for Birthdays, Anniversaries or any special occasion up to 12 people.

Our US Coastguard certified captains have 10+ years experience & they're outgoing and accommodating personalities will ensure that is most enjoyable.

*Please read the inclusions & exclusions*

Miami.Title: City Tour Miami PLUS (City Tour + Boat Tour)
Miami.Description: Our City Tour Miami PLUS is a mix of Culture, History and Fun that makes visitors to enjoy a whole day of full entertainment. We Pick up in your Hotel with Round Trip Transportation

Miami.Title: Miami Celebrity Homes Cruise
Miami.Description:
We offer multiple times, seven days a week, on two different boats. All you need to do is pick up your boarding pass at the dock and come on board one of the highest rated sightseeing cruise tours in Miami. Our crew will work hard to make sure you see the best views of the opulent mansions and unique sights along our route. Feel free to walk around our boats and take advantage of our frozen cocktails, cold beer, or sodas.

See many of the rich and opulent homes of the wealthy, famous, and infamous, like Shaquille O’Neil, Gloria Estefan, Al Capone, and where many movies have been filmed, like Bad Boys, Scarface, and Miami Vice, to name a few

Don't take our word for it, we are the highest rated boat tour company on TripAdvisor, just search Fiesta Cruises of Miami and see what others have to say about us.

Miami.Title: Miami Millionaire’s Row Cruise
Miami.Description: There’s a lot of Miami to see from the water, and this cruise around Biscayne Bay shows off the highlights. A guide points out the star attractions, such as Millionaire's Row, the Port of Miami, Fisher Island, and more. Cruises depart throughout the day, so you can choose a departure that works with your schedule.

Miami.Title: Private Romantic Excursion Air Tour with Champagne
Miami.Description: Experience Miami beach from the air. This memorable tour flies you over South Beach shoreline, Key Biscayne, Downtown Miami, Venetian, Star and Palm Islands and other iconic spots.

Miami.Title: Private Miami & Ft. Lauderdale Helicopter Tour with Ocean Views
Miami.Description:
We will offer you a unique experience from the moment you arrive until the end, not only because of the tour but because of our detailed oriented personalized customer service. 

This guided tour will allow you to appreciate part of this beautiful city from a different perspective, from the buildings, mansions, and constructions, to the variety of wild-ocean life.

The boats, cruises, and cargo ships can be seen all at once around the Ft. Lauderdale Port Everglades.

If it’s your lucky day, which we know it will be, you can see dolphins, sharks, turtles, rays, manatees and more, while we are flying over the ocean, near the shoreline. You will be amazed at how closed these species can get to you when you are having fun at the beach. 

In general, flying in a helicopter generates different emotions, from facing your fears, to experiencing a high sense of amaze, gratitude, and happiness.

Miami.Title: Private Romantic Sunset Boat Cruise in Miami
Miami.Description:
Sunset time for two

Enjoy a romantic and special moment with your favorite person in the city of the sun. 

That is why we have created this beautiful boat experience for two people where you can enjoy one frozen bottles of Prosecco during a two-hour tour.

Starting from the Rickenbaker Marina in Key Biscayne passing through Fisher Island, which is one of the most exclusive islands in Miami since its only access is by boat, continuing through Miami Beach where we will show you the famous islands where some famous and millionaire mansions are. Then you can enjoy the wonderful view of the modern buildings of Downtown Miami and the financial district and Brickell, and ending this fascinating tour at the same starting point of our Marina Rickenbaker.

This tour does not have any long stops. If you already know Miami now do it from the water next to us. This is a private tour, non-stop (no-swimming).

Miami.Title: Parasailing with Miami Watersports
Miami.Description: Go parasailing off the coast of Miami for an exhilarating experience in this tropical paradise! As you float high above the waters of Biscayne Bay, get incredible views over Coconut Grove and the Miami skyline. Soar through the air in the company of two friends; they can help you be on the lookout for dolphins and turtles swimming below! All instruction and safety gear is provided, no experience necessary.

Miami.Title: City Half Day Tour of Miami by Bus with Sightseeing Cruise
Miami.Description: See the highlights of Miami by land and sea on this half-day bus and boat tour. Visit Miami's most popular neighborhoods on an open-top double-decker bus tour, make a stop at the Bayside Marketplace for lunch and shopping, and enjoy a boat ride around the local islands.

Miami.Title: Private Sailing Adventure in Miami's Biscayne Bay
Miami.Description:
We have been sailing the Biscayne Bay for over 15 years, just for the fun of it. We started this eco-tour in 2018 to share the amazing experience of wind travel with others. Or as we like to say, share the magic.

You will meet the founders/guides David or JP, we are originally from Argentina and Venezuela and have been living in Miami for over 20 years. We share a passion for protecting Biscayne Bay and its wildlife, as well as creating beautiful memories for our guests.

Our float of Hobie Catamarans were designed with surfing in mind, you'll glide over the water and be in contact with your surroundings. Thanks to their convenient maneuverability and size, they'll allow you to experience every corner of Biscayne Bay like no other boat can. These boats are extremely safe and comfortable for people of all ages.
Miami.Supplier: Sailing Adventure in Miami's Biscayne Bay National Park

Miami.Title: Private Exotic Air Tour 45 Minutes
Miami.Description: Experience Miami beach from the air. This memorable tour flies you over South Beach shoreline, Key Biscayne, Downtown Miami, Venetian, Star and Palm Islands and other iconic spots.

Miami.Title: Sightseeing Hurricane Speedboat Tour of Miami
Miami.Description:
Thriller Miami Hurricane is Miami’s new, unique, 85 passenger vessel, offering a speedboat tour. The first boat of it’s kind in the South East United States. Passengers will see Miami at Maximum speed!

Thriller Miami Hurricane provides a 45 minute safe, fast, jet boat ride providing photo opportunities of the beautiful Miami's Skyline while in Biscayne Bay and showing passengers Miami from Thriller Miami Hurricane's unique perspective.

Miami.Title: Authentic Little Havana Food and Culture Walking Tour
Miami.Description: Live a day like a Cuban: discover Little Havana and learn about the local culture and history on this half-day tour. Taste authentic Cuban foods, like Guava-pastries and stewed meat (included in price) from family-owned restaurants and learn about the history and influence of Cuban culture in Miami from your guide. This tour will also take you past important Cuban landmarks such as the Bay of Pigs Museum and Cuban Memorial Park. This is a small-group tour with a maximum of 10 travelers per booking.
